user.title: VESC Hub BMS Setup
user.description: Configure connection to your VESCHub. For public VESCHub (veschub.vedder.se), provide VESC ID and password. For local VESCHub, these fields are optional.

data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of your VESCHub. Default: veschub.vedder.se for public hub
data_description.vesc_id: Your VESC identifier for authentication on public VESCHub
data_description.password: Password for your VESC on public VESCHub
data_description.can_id_hint: IMPORTANT: Specify YOUR CAN IDs only (e.g., 0,116). On shared VESCHub servers, automatic scanning is disabled to prevent discovering other users' devices. Default: [0] (local VESC only).

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to VESCHub. Please check your host and port settings.

abort.unknown_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs and try again.

init.title: VESC Hub BMS Options

data.trigger_full_scan: Perform full CAN scan (0-254) - USE CAREFULLY on shared servers!

data_description.can_id_list_str: YOUR CAN IDs only! Example: 0,116 (0=local VESC, 116=your ADV500). Do NOT add other users' devices!
data_description.trigger_full_scan: ⚠️ CAUTION: On shared VESCHub, this will discover ALL users' devices, not just yours. Only use if you know your specific CAN IDs.
